about_the_game:
This dlc for the game Roomie Romance is a stand alone free artpack

The artpack includes 500x500 pixel images of the two main characters of the game in our standard design style, for people to use as avatars in online forums and other locations.

(non commercial use only)

The set includes:
- 8x 500x500 pixel Avatars of Senpai Character.
- 8x 500x500 pixel Avatars of Mira Character.

content_descriptors.notes: This DLC adds additional intimate scenes depicting sexual relations between the various characters and full body nudity. Additional content is shown visually and with descriptive text alongside them.

detailed_description:
This dlc for the game Roomie Romance is a stand alone free artpack

The artpack includes 500x500 pixel images of the two main characters of the game in our standard design style, for people to use as avatars in online forums and other locations.

(non commercial use only)

The set includes:
- 8x 500x500 pixel Avatars of Senpai Character.
- 8x 500x500 pixel Avatars of Mira Character.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 +
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8 or later
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Roomie Romance - Avatars

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080

short_description: A collection of character Avatars from the game 'Roomie Romance'.
